import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useFormik } from 'formik' import * as yup from 'yup' function AddRequest({groups, fetchGroups}) { useEffect(() => {fetchGroups()}, []) const formSchema = yup.object().shape({ name: yup.string().required('Enter group name, dummy!'), type: yup.string().required('Enter group name, dummy!'), quality: yup.string().required('Enter group name, dummy!') }) console.log(groups) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { name: '', type: '', quality: '' }, validationSchema: formSchema, validateOnChange: false, // validateOnBlur: false }) return (

Add Request

{formik.errors.name}

{formik.errors.type}

{formik.errors.quality}
